title: [LOVE] Ep. 19: How To Find Love (Or Keep It) w/Jane Garapick
description:
Have you ever had the thought, why does love feel so hard? Whether you’re single and can't seem to find the right person, or in a relationship and struggling with why things don’t feel as easy as they should, you’re not alone. Relationship and dating coach Jane Garapick joins Ashley on this episode of the You Turn Podcast to discuss why finding and keeping love can feel so hard, and how to break through those boundaries. Jane dives into the three steps to really learning the deep truths about yourself and what you look for in a partner, so you can truly find the person perfectly suited to you and your happiness. And don’t forget to stay tuned for Ashley’s post episode thoughts!

 Check out Jane’s website, gettingtotruelove.com

 You can also find more information on her program, Beautiful Confident Radiant You, here.
